itemInfo.itemDesc:
A suit worn by Calpheon aristocrats. It's both fabulous and practical.

- Item Effect: Amity +15% from a conversation

※ If you use a costume exchange coupon, you will get the same suit with an additional effect of Movement Speed +2. The costume can be equipped in the same slot as a pearl costume.

If you exchange it for a costume, you cannot register it to the Item Marketplace.

item.name: Design: Calpheon Noble Suit - Berserker
item.desc: A design required to craft a Capheon Noble costume. This is used in the Berserker’s costume. \n\n- How to Obtain: This can be found in the Calpheon Tailor Amity Shop.

item.name: Cotton Fabric
item.desc:
A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.

- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Grinding Cotton Yarn. It requires the knowledge of Grinding: Beginner.

※ Find Ornella in Heidel and complete the Materials for Equipment Repair Quest to obtain related knowledge.

※ In order to perform the Quest for Beginner Processing knowledge, achieve Gathering Level 14 or higher and visit Ficy in Heidel to complete the corresponding Quest. Refer to the Black Spirit Guide (/key) for detailed information.

item.name: Fine Fancy Feather
item.desc: A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.\n\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Thinning Fancy Feathers. It requires knowledge of Thinning.
